summary: "Once Upon a Time in the West" is a 1968 Italian Western film directed by Sergio Leone. It stars Henry Fonda as the villain, Charles Bronson as his enemy, and Claudia Cardinale as a new widow. The story, co-written by Dario Argento, Bernardo Bertolucci, and Leone, follows a bandit and a homesteader in the American West. The film was a box-office hit in Europe but struggled in the US due to editing changes. It's now considered one of the best Westerns ever made and is part of Leone's "Once Upon a Time" trilogy.
title: Once Upon a Time in the West
